Description: Pottery bowl made from coarse straw tempered Nile silt with many white inclusions, left rough on exterior, smoothed on interior. Rim deformed, orifice not round
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 24; xxxi.17g reproduced was Late ware L17g in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric pottery. Marked H132a on base.
